#summary Create or update a user account.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||AddUser||String||Yes||
||`UserID`||UUID of the user to create or update||UUID||Yes||
||`Name`||Account name||String||Yes||
||`Email`||E-mail address associated with this account||String||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=AddUser
&UserID=efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0
&Name=John+Doe
&Email=john.doe%40email.com
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the request succeeded, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
